TableContextTimeStampBeforeTable: {33748=The Back to Belmore game against South Sydney Rabbitohs is on February 9 and tickets are still available., 35932=After 13 years with South Sydney, Bob McCarthy moved to Canterbury for the 1976 and 1977 seasons where he played at Second Row and played 40 games for the club helping them to the semi-finals in 1976, with many saying they should have won the 1976 premiership with the side they have., 34272=For Bob who played for both the Bulldogs and the Bunnies certainly remembers the games between the clubs and on February 9 the two clubs will be at it again in the Back to Belmore trial.}
